content:
Dataverse is producing server.log files with 2 Mb every minute with a warning message '[2025-05-28T11:21:42.478+0100] [Payara 5.2022.3] [WARNING] [] [edu.harvard.iq.dataverse.util.BundleUtil] [tid: _ThreadID=75 _ThreadName=http-thread-pool::http-listener-1(3)] [timeMillis: 1748427702478] [levelValue: 900] [[ No property file named extVocabDemoMetadata_en found in /home/dataverse/langBundles, using untranslated values]]' .

Why is this happening?
What can I do to solve this?
sender_full_name: AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves

content: A message was moved here from #troubleshooting > Updating metadata block controlled vocab by Philip Durbin.

Let's see, I saw something similar here:

In containers, "No property file named Bundle_en found in /dv/lang, using untranslated values"Â #11043
